titleStmt.title: A motion against imprisonment, vvherein is proved that imprisonment for debt is against the Gospel, against the good of Church, and Commonwealth / by Thomas Grantham, Master in Arts; curate of Eston, neere Tocester in Northampton-sheire..
titleStmt.author: Grantham, Thomas, d. 1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
